price: And We have made them subservient to them; some they ride, and from others they eat,
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
